#labels Procedures
Used to set the argument value for a specific argument of a kernel. 

Interface [http://www.khronos.org/registry/cl/sdk/1.1/docs/man/xhtml/clSetKernelArg.html clSetKernelArg].

=== Interfaces ===

This is the interface to pass memory object:

<code language="Fortran">
subroutine clSetKernelArg(kernel, arg_index, arg_value, errcode_ret)
  type(cl_kernel), intent(inout) :: kernel
  integer,         intent(in)    :: arg_index
  type(cl_mem),    intent(in)    :: arg_value
  integer,         intent(out)   :: errcode_ret
end subroutine clSetKernelArg
</code>

This is the interface for passing scalar values (`real`, `real(8)`, `integer`):

<code language="Fortran">
subroutine clsetkernelarg(kernel, arg_index, arg_value, errcode_ret)
  type(cl_kernel), intent(inout) :: kernel
  integer,         intent(in)    :: arg_index
  type(scalar),    intent(in)    :: arg_value
  integer,         intent(out)   :: errcode_ret
end subroutine clsetkernelarg
</code>

For setting a `__local` type argument, use [clSetKernelArgLocal].
